CustomField.description: Pulls the address info from the location of violations. Used for adding to output docs
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( Location_of_Violations__c ) ), Location_of_Violations__r.Address__c + ', ' + Location_of_Violations__r.City__c + ', ' + TEXT (Location_of_Violations__r.State__c ) + ' ' + Location_of_Violations__r.Zip_Code__c , '')
CustomField.label: Location of Violation - Address
